articles.title: Asus launches first foldable laptop `Asus Zenbook 17 Fold OLED` in India; Check specs, price, more - Zee News
articles.description: Tech company Asus has launched its first foldable laptop called ‘Asus Zenbook 17 Fold OLED’ in India. Customers can pre-book the laptop till November 9. However, the new product will go on sale from November 10, 2022.
